00014 #ifndef MC2JSON_JPATH_ASSIGNER
00015 #define MC2JSON_JPATH_ASSIGNER
00016 
00017 #include "JPathMultiExpression.h"
00018 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00019 #include <vector>
00020 
00021 namespace MC2JSON {
00022 
00023 namespace JPath {
00024 
00030 template <typename T>
00031 class Assigner: public MultiExpression::NodeEvaluator {
00032 public:
00033    Assigner( T& val ):m_value( val ) { }
00034    virtual ~Assigner() {
00035    }
00036    inline void operator() ( const NodeType& node ) try {
00037       m_value = node.get_value< T >();
00038    } catch ( const std::exception& e ) {
00039       if ( typeid ( T ) != typeid( MC2String ) ) {
00040          // the any was not T, so lets try with string and 
00041          // lexical cast it.
00042          try {
00043             m_value =
00044                boost::lexical_cast< T >
00045                ( node.get_str() );
00046          } catch ( const std::exception& convE ) {
00047             throw EvaluateException( convE.what() );
00048          } catch ( ... ) {
00049             throw EvaluateException( "Unknown exception" );
00050          }
00051       } else {
00052          throw EvaluateException( e.what() );
00053       }
00054    }
00055 
00056 private:
00057    T& m_value;
00058 };
00059 
00064 template <typename T >
00065 class VectorAssigner: public MultiExpression::NodeEvaluator {
00066 public:
00067    typedef typename std::vector<T> Vector;
00068    explicit VectorAssigner( Vector& val ):m_value( val ) { }
00069    virtual ~VectorAssigner() {
00070    }
00071 
00072    void operator() ( const NodeType& node ) {
00073       T value;
00074       Assigner<T> helper( value );
00075       helper( node );
00076       m_value.push_back( value );
00077    }
00078 
00079 private:
00080    Vector& m_value;
00081 };
00082 
00083 template <typename T>
00084 VectorAssigner<T>*
00085 makeAssigner( typename std::vector<T>& value ) {
00086    return new VectorAssigner< T >( value );
00087 }
00088 
00090 template <typename T>
00091 Assigner<T>* makeAssigner( T& value ) {
00092    return new Assigner<T>( value );
00093 }
00094 
00095 } // JPath
00096 
00097 } // MC2JSON
00098 
00099 #endif // MC2JSON_JPATH_ASSIGNER
